reviewText: anything by InXS is much appreciated
Picture quality is not so good, but sound quality is terrible.

Great DVD. Amazon delivered this dvd on time (Before the expected date), in great condition and kept me posted from the time it left them, to the time it was put into my Mailbox. Highly recomend, and definatly will be shopping with Amazon agan.

I recently became a fan of INXS after watching the reality show ROCKSTAR: INXS.  I have bought everyone of their CD's/DVD's/VHS tapes.  I even saw them in concert recently!

Even though this DVD featured other Austrialian artists, I wanted to add it to my collection.  I definitely could have done without the other artists.  It is no wonder INXS are featured last because they are THE reason for having this DVD!

Unfortunately, I had to return the DVD twice because of defects in it. Specifically, the picture breaking up into small squares (pixels?) for extended periods.  Hopefully Amazon just received a bad batch and when I reorder another copy in the future it will be O.K.
